settings.text: Onder de indruk van de Nanoshield kentekenplaatfolie! Makkelijk aan te brengen en biedt uitstekende bescherming voor mijn nummerplaat. Een echte aanrader!
Er gaat niets boven de Nanoshield-licentieplaatfolie. Transparant, duurzaam en mijn nummerplaat blijft er gloednieuw uitzien. Elke cent waard!
De Nanoshield-licentieplaatfolie overtrof mijn verwachtingen. Makkelijk te installeren en het heeft mijn nummerplaat beschermd tegen krassen en kleine botsingen. Een echte aanrader!
De Nanoshield License Plate Film is een game-changer. Biedt ongelooflijke bescherming zonder afbreuk te doen aan de esthetiek van mijn nummerplaat. Geweldige investering!

settings.title: ENJOY DRIVES WITHOUT FINES!
settings.description:
Easy to use

Just pick up for your

license plates
Simplify your life with ready-made symbols! Block key parts of your license plate to outsmart symbol-matching methods!

settings.title: Effective protection 24/7!
settings.description: Nanofilm works both day and night. We guarantee high resistance against car washes, rain, snow. I’ts not problem for Ecoslick film

settings.title: Fully complies with legal requirements!
settings.description: Nanofilm is 100% legal in your country. It keeps your plate readable from any distance, seamlessly matching the font with no changes

settings.title: Nanofilms confessions!
settings.description: The trick you didn’t know you needed, that now you can’t live without.

settings.title: Choose your symbols!
settings.left_message: In order to avoid the matching method, you have to stick as many symbols as possible on both sides
settings.right_message_1: Get more symbols and get the best offer!

settings.title: Also you can order universal material (for cutting)

settings.description: Check out the video to connect or follow the guided steps below
settings.title: Set up.

settings.question: Step 1: Wipe your license plate from dust.
settings.answer: • Before sticking, wipe your license plate from dust with an alcohol wipe (it is included in the kit).

settings.question: Step 2: Place the sticker on the desired symbol.
settings.answer: • Completely remove the top edge of the mounting film along with the symbol. Place the sticker on the desired symbol and press firmly

settings.question: Having troubles? Visit our Frequently asked Questions.
